text: jin logon ne inakaar kiya ve kahate hai, "ham is quraan ko kadaapi na maanenge aur na usako jo isake aage hai." aur yadi tum dekh paate jab zaalim apane rab ke saamane khade kar die jaenge. ve aapas mein ek-doosare par ilzaam daal rahe honge. jo log kamazor samajhe gae ve un logon se jo bade banate the kahenge, "yadi tum na hote to ham avashy hee eemaanavaale hote.
